channel.title: The Science Radio
channel.description:
It's all about re-creating old school hip hop mix-show radio from way back like Red Alert, Mr Magic, Marley Marl, Clark Kent, Pete Rock, Stretch & Bobbito. Taking it back to the 2 copies live in the mix!!!!
Email: djsaul74@hotmail.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Old School Hip Hop Mix Shows!
